feed.title: UC Merced HPC & JupyterHub Documentation Blog
feed.subtitle: UC Merced HPC & JupyterHub Documentation Blog

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: The UC Merced HPC documentation blog page highlights the latest HPC news and developments within the community. The CIRT team encourages users to visit the blog frequently to explore topics of interest and share relevant news with others. We will continue to post updates, news, and opportunities, and we warmly welcome users to participate in these activities.
entry.content:
The UC Merced HPC documentation blog page highlights the latest HPC news and developments within the community. The CIRT team encourages users to visit the blog frequently to explore topics of interest and share relevant news with others. We will continue to post updates, news, and opportunities, and we warmly welcome users to participate in these activities.

Here are a few topics that you might find useful.

  • Community news
    • Campus Champion
    • CaRCC
  • Job opportunies

entry.title: Job post
entry.summary: System Administrator for HPC cluster at Kansas State University
entry.content: System Administrator for HPC cluster at Kansas State University
